emuInput.TitMainTitle: Herron Hill Junior High School principal John H. Morgart presenting awards to students, on stage in Herron Hill Junior High School with sponge painted backdrop with trees
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper February 8, 1947, pg. 2, reads: "Presents Awards - Promotion exercises for the 9-A Class of Herron Hill Junior High School were held last Tuesday at 2 P. M. Principal John H. Morgart made the awards which went to Robert Murray and Cora Briggs who received Gerwig Awards, and 8-A students Norman Fisher and Elinor Williams who received the American Legion Award. - Harris Photo."
